sentence: We selected the weekend romance package with the wine tasting experience
We have always been amazed with the customer service here but tonight we tried the culinary experience with Chef Michael

I had an awesome experience spending time at Chateau Elan I decided to treat myself to a ME day hats off to Chef Michael for an awesome class he taught for the Culinary class he is extremely talented and Chateau Elan should be proud to have such a great young man to be part of your team
it is a somewhat better than average business conference hotel with nice rooms and a very nice setting just north of Atlanta
Everything we imagined and more for our first experience in the south we were very pleased
Had a wonderful experience touring the Winery and wine tasting
High touch high drama approach provides entertainment in luxurious surroundings
Friendly staff relaxing atmosphere beautiful scenery
The wine tasting experience was also great and informative
Surroundings of this resort are beautiful well manicured and impressive looking
Apart from the food the ambience has gone completely downhill as well
before giving all the negative aspect I will say they have a very clean facility but let me start with the food if you like salty food then eat there
Our experience at Chateau Elan was all around disappointing
We enjoyed our time during the day and evening on the property however our sleeping environment and follow up customer service was terrible
regrettably and unfortunately our most recent visit did not match our previous experiences or meet our expectations
By far the worst experience my wife and I have ever had
Maybe partner with other companies to create a more robust experience
Overall the experience at the property was disappointing
While it was a great experience and a beautiful place housekeeping could definitely use a refresher course
Fast forward to the present the experience is dry as the chicken and sparse is not the word but barren of good thoughtfully prepared selections is not far off
